wikipedia_page.main: Lionel Colin Brewill (1889–1943) ARIBA TD was an architect based in Nottingham.

response: He worked in partnership with Basil Edgar Baily from 1894 to 1922 in Nottingham. He was succeeded by his son, Lionel Colin Brewill.
*Lionel Colin Brewill (1889–1943), British architect, son of Arthur
